1.title: Return of the Demon
1.plot: After a thousand years of captivity, Heihu the demon has escaped from his magic prison. He has possessed Dadamei, a young farm girl, and under this appearance has gathered around him a gang of heinous outlaws: the Black-Foxes? Heihu and his ...

2.title: Hangman's Swamp
2.plot: Sanzang is found dead, or nearly so. He will die without the antidote to the poison that a criminal hand has slipped in his drink at the heart of Shaolin itself! While the other masters are leading the investigation to uncover the assassin ...

3.title: Kwai Gonjin
3.plot: A dishevelled, old man dressed in rags, using a secret passage, slips inside the Shaolin monastery. After a long and arduous quest, he has found the Second Book of Power and is bringing it to the Grand Master! However, when he sees Sanzang, he ...

4.title: Your Worst Enemy
4.plot: Sanzang is worried; he is disappointed with young protÃ©gÃ©s. Tang is arrogant and disrespectful to his masters. Cheng can?t seem to find his place at Shaolin and believes he would be of more use to his family by going home. And as for Hua, she is ...

5.title: The River-Dragons
5.plot: Each river, each stream, each trickle of water in China is inhabited by a dragon. For the most part, these River-Dragons are calm and protective of their surroundings. However, lately, they have been riled up against humankind, attacking boats ...

6.title: The Flip-Side
6.plot: At the Shaolin school, all of the students pick on Anping. Only Hua is friends with him and defends him. During an exercise, Anping is abandoned accidentally in the middle of the forest. He finds shelter in a giant terrier. There, he finds a ...

7.title: The Daikinis
7.plot: What is happening at Fu-Yan? At the height of summer, the village is suddenly plunged into the heart of winter. Snow starts to fall, the river is frozen over but most surprisingly, mysterious creatures, the DÃ¢kinis, appear and attack the inhabitants.

8.title: The Imperial Escort
8.plot: The Shaolin Wuzangs have been assigned to escort the imperial Prince to Kaifeng. This trip is cloaked in utter secrecy and yet Heihu, the demon, still manages to discover the itinerary and lay in ambush. There?s a traitor at the Emperor?s court!

9.title: The Wheel of Time
9.plot: Hua is convinced that these caves hide the legendary Wheel of Time, a magical portal that allows ? as its name indicates ? time travel. The boys however are tired and decide to go back to Shaolin. As for Hua, she would rather keep on looking.

10.title: Deep Within the Mirror
10.plot: Heihu?s Black-Foxes have been responsible for more and more attacks as of late and oddly enough, are stealing all the old mirrors they find at the site of their crimes. Our heroes are sent to Li Shizhen, a hermit herbalist who is 112 years old ...

11.title: The K?Uei
11.plot: The Shaolin tunnels are home to all sorts of more or less dangerous creatures the Wuzangs have captured and locked up to prevent them from wreaking more harm. This is what had happened to the K?Uei, vile creatures, as ugly as they are ferocious, ...

12.title: Little Sister
12.plot: For Shaolin?s Wuzangs, finding the Second Book of Power before Heihu is a priority. When Junxiu, Cheng?s younger sister, declares she has found a map leading to it, our heroes dash straight off. Junxiu of course wants to be part of the adventure.

13.title: The Veil of Light
13.plot: The General Daoshen, head of the Imperial Guard, has a meeting with the Black Foxes. He is supposed to give them the Veil of Light he stole for them form the Emperor?s treasures. Our young heroes just happen to run into him. Thinking they have ...

14.title: Frog Spirit
14.plot: Because of Tang?s arrogance, Master Sanzang has punished our three young disciples. They must climb a mountain to cut wood at its summit in the company of Master Fong. On their way, they come across a small group of Black Foxes. After an ...

15.title: Diamond eyes
15.plot: Our heroes have Sanzang?s permission to leave Shaolin in order to help Cheng?s family with the harvest. Xin, Cheng?s elder brother, is in love with a young woman he would like to marry. Meili, the young woman in question, is an orphan that ...

16.title: The Ogres of KaÃ¯feng
16.plot: KaÃ¯feng, the capital of Henan, is stricken by fear ever since the ogres have appeared. Two important members of the community have disappeared and the inhabitants no longer dare leave their homes. Where do these ferocious creatures come from?

17.title: Yi?s Sacred Bow
17.plot: Yi?s sacred bow - a magical bow that never misses its target and said to have been made by the Gods themselves - has been stolen from the Fu-Long monastery. The thief is planning on bringing the magical arm back to Heihu, who plans on using it ...

18.title: The Pavilion of Whispers
18.plot: Tang is fearless, or so he says! This is why Hua and Cheng take him to the Pavilion of Whispers, a supposedly haunted spot. Once there, the two dare him to stay inside the sinister building as long as possible, alongside strange noises and ...

19.title: Young Love
19.plot: All of the Shaolin monastery is astir: Master Fong has disappeared. After having hesitated, scared they were gong to be punished, our heroes decide to tell what they know. During one of their nocturnal ? and forbidden - escapades, they came ...

20.title: The Realm of Quiet Waters
20.plot: During a boat ride, our heroes are caught out in a storm. Hua is thrown overboard and the search efforts come to naught: she has certainly drowned. But Cheng and Tang refuse to accept this. Hua had talked to them of a city built at the bottom ...

21.title: A Thousand Faces
21.plot: The Shaolin monastery is getting ready to welcome the emperor of China in person! The event inspires Heihu to new levels of dastardly deeds: kidnap the emperor and replace him with a twin that serves the demon. In order to do so, he obtains the ...

22.title: Kunlun
22.plot: Kunlun, the realm of the gods, has been profaned. Heihu the demon has dared to attack it. He has destroyed the sleep flowers and kidnapped Chuang-Kung and Chuang-Mu, the gardeners of the gods, so that the flowers will never grow again.

23.title: Shadow Thief
23.plot: To their surprise, Tang and Cheng are summoned to Kaifeng by the General Daoshen. Master Sanzang and Hua decide to go with them. During their trip, they meet a poor woman, Rou Jia whose husband is hovering between life and death ever since ...

24.title: The Invisible Castle
24.plot: Junxiu, Cheng?s younger sister, was taking the family buffalo out to pasture when under her very eyes, stone towers took shape, then ramparts, a roof and crenellated battlements? A castle appeared out of thin air, by magic! Faceless warriors ...

25.title: Xi Rang
25.plot: It?s monsoon season. Flood rains raise the level of the dangerous Yellow River. If the dams break, the plains will be flooded and it will be an utter catastrophe for the farmers who live there. Sanzang, the Shaolin wuzangs and our heroes help ...

26.title: The Trap
26.plot: Heihu the demon wants to possess the Second Book of Power, the most sacred of all objects, which will make him the Ruler of the World! In order to do so, he has ordered the kidnapping of all the soothsayers throughout the country and has forced ...

imdb.plot outline: Set in Ancient China, three teenagers are admitted into the most prestigious school of kung fu: the Temple of Shaolin. But they don't know that they are the reincarnation of three Shaolin monks who a thousand years earlier gave their life to neutralize the worst demon. This demon is back now and our three heroes will have to destroy it while initiating themselves with the art of kung fu.
imdb.title: Shaolin Wuzang
plot: Set in Ancient China, three teenagers are admitted into the most prestigious school of kung fu: the Temple of Shaolin. But they don't know that they are the reincarnation of three Shaolin monks who a thousand years earlier gave their life to neutralize the worst demon.
